thread.section_title: BEST WESTERN De Neuville - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Romantic Stay In The City Of Love
thread.title_full: Romantic Stay In The City Of Love - Review of BEST WESTERN De Neuville, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Shilly14
title: Romantic Stay In The City Of Love
text:
Arrived Friday late afternoon.
Friendly reception staff who was very helpful.
Told us than we paid too much for a Uber from Charles De Gaulle Airport and offered a cheaper alternative which was great.
Was offered the breakfast at €15 person but found that a bit pricey so turned it down but was offered at a reduce rate at €10 which was reasonable.
The elevator up to the room was tiny but manageable.
The room small but enough space for a couple.
Very clean and modern.
The bathroom again was clean and modern.
Checking out was easy and smooth and was offered the chance to leave our bags as we were leaving early Sunday evening.
Would stay at this lovely chic place again.
